review: I have 75' Samsung curved UHD TV and wasn't sure why I would need this ever. I got it when it went on sale to play with it and had to buy 2 more. I don't use it on my Samsung smart tv because there is no need, I can screen mirror from my Samsung 6s. But for my garage and both of my kids this is awesome. I was even able to send back the Direct TV boxes from there rooms! If wasn't for Direct TV's exclusive on the NFL, I would drop them all together. If you can find it for $20 bucks like I did why not try it out?
author: Moose9779

review: Literally, one of the best and most useful purchases i have ever made

review: I bought this for travel and it seems to work fine. No issues with the product design. It was just not what I thought it was.This requires Google Chrome to work.I had to get a portable AP and not all hotels have wired networking. I get to use this at about 50% of the hotels I stay at.
author: Erin Fortenberry
